# Arbeid med dine data

## Fyll inn

```{r d}
#| message: false
#| warning: false
#| echo: false

library(tidyverse)

# From the article 

# 10.1136/jramc-2017-000887

my_list <- list(
  weight = c(50, 50, 70, 70, 90, 90),
  load = c(25, 38, 25, 38, 25, 38),
  terrain= c(1.1),
  velocity = 2.2,
  grade = 0)

my_list


# Extract constants
w <- my_list$weight
t <- my_list$terrain
v <- my_list$velocity
g <- my_list$grade

# Prepare result vector
result <- numeric(length(c(my_list$load)))

# For loop over weight
for (i in seq_along(c(my_list$load & my_list$weight))) {
  l <- my_list$load[i]
  w <- my_list$weight[i]
  
  result[i] <- 1.5 * w +
    2.0 * (w + l) * (l / w)^2 +
    t * (w + l) * (1.5 * v^2 + 0.35 * v * g) 
  
}

# View results
result

my_list$result <- result

r <- data.frame(my_list)

r


result_2 <- numeric(length(my_list$result))

# For loop over weight
for (i in seq_along(my_list$result)) {
  r <- my_list$result[i]
  w <- my_list$weight[i]
  
  result_2[i] <- r * 0.01433 / w
  
}

result_2
my_list$result_2 <- result_2

df <-  data.frame(my_list)



kableExtra::kable(df)
```
